articles.title: Football lawmakers to make permanent substitutions change after Premier League agreement - The Mirror
articles.description: The International Football Association Board (IFAB) will formalise the change to allow five substitutions per team, per match during a meeting in Doha, Qatar on Monday
articles.content:
The number of substitutions allowed in football matches will increase from three to five as part of a change to the rules of the Beautiful Game.
